themes: preponderance of the small (naming the Maia)
need to translate patterns into precise language
detail as the proof of logic
discipline, restraint, and research before expression
collective projection: “you have the facts, right?”
fear: fear of mistakes in the detail / fear of being unable to prove the logic

classical.hd_quote: The ability to transcend the boredom of routine through a rich and daring fantasy life.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Builds reliable detail through steady ritual plus inner simulations.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Endless theorizing; never publishing the pattern.

classical.hd_quote: The innate restrictiveness and discipline to comply with and exalt restraint.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Looks like it’s doing detail and often is.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Appears precise but hasn’t actually checked the data.

classical.hd_quote: The ability to discover valuable information in detail work and find innovative applications.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Finds new facts by getting it ‘wrong’ first.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Quits because detail is boring, missing the discovery.

classical.hd_quote: The perfected ascetic withdrawal in the pursuit of harmony and simplicity.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Leaves the noise to complete the detail correctly.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Endless research; never presenting the pattern.

classical.hd_quote: When excellence is achieved, action is necessary.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Waits until the detail is complete, then delivers.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Seduced by projection → speaks before details are ready.

classical.hd_quote: Detail as the path to material success.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Gives detail only when it will actually guide the collective.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Has the skills but not the discipline to use them.

meta.provenance: classical.hd_title and classical.hd_quote are verbatim (<25 words) pulls from Ra Uru Hu’s “Rave I’Ching / Line Companion” section “Hexagram 62 – Preponderance of the Small” (Archive.org / PDFCoffee mirrors, lines ~4768–4846). Interpretations are original behavioral mappings aligned to the user’s HD → S³ schema.
